original_text: Then the king of Egypt summoned the midwives and asked them, “Why have you done this? Why have you let the boys live?”
korean_text: 애굽 왕이 산파를 불러 그들에게 이르되 너희가 어찌하여 이같이 남자 아기들을 살렸느냐

sentences.original_text: Then the king of Egypt summoned the midwives
sentences.korean_translation: 그때 애굽 왕은 산파들을 불러 들였고

sentences.original_text: Why have you let the boys live?”
